00019 #ifndef _XENOMAI_ALCHEMY_TIMER_H
00020 #define _XENOMAI_ALCHEMY_TIMER_H
00021 
00022 #include <stddef.h>
00023 #include <copperplate/clockobj.h>
00024 
00025 typedef ticks_t RTIME;
00026 
00027 typedef sticks_t SRTIME;
00028 
00029 #define TM_INFINITE  0
00030 #define TM_NOW       0
00031 #define TM_NONBLOCK  ((RTIME)-1ULL)
00032 
00033 typedef struct rt_timer_info {
00034         RTIME period;
00035         RTIME date;
00036         RTIME tsc;
00037 } RT_TIMER_INFO;
00038 
00039 extern struct clockobj alchemy_clock;
00040 
00041 #define alchemy_abs_timeout(__t, __ts)                                  \
00042         ({                                                              \
00043                 (__t) == TM_INFINITE ? NULL :                           \
00044                 (__t) == TM_NONBLOCK ?                                  \
00045                 ({ (__ts)->tv_sec = (__ts)->tv_nsec = 0; (__ts); }) :   \
00046                 ({ clockobj_ticks_to_timespec(&alchemy_clock, (__t), (__ts)); \
00047                         (__ts); });                                     \
00048         })
00049 
00050 #define alchemy_rel_timeout(__t, __ts)                                  \
00051         ({                                                              \
00052                 (__t) == TM_INFINITE ? NULL :                           \
00053                 (__t) == TM_NONBLOCK ?                                  \
00054                 ({ (__ts)->tv_sec = (__ts)->tv_nsec = 0; (__ts); }) :   \
00055                 ({ clockobj_ticks_to_timeout(&alchemy_clock, (__t), (__ts)); \
00056                         (__ts); });                                     \
00057         })
00058 
00059 static inline
00060 int alchemy_poll_mode(const struct timespec *abs_timeout)
00061 {
00062         return abs_timeout &&
00063                 abs_timeout->tv_sec == 0 &&
00064                 abs_timeout->tv_nsec == 0;
00065 }
00066 
00067 #ifdef __cplusplus
00068 extern "C" {
00069 #endif
00070 
00071 static inline RTIME rt_timer_tsc(void)
00072 {
00073         return clockobj_get_tsc();
00074 }
00075 
00076 static inline SRTIME rt_timer_ns2tsc(SRTIME ns)
00077 {
00078         return clockobj_ns_to_tsc(ns);
00079 }
00080 
00081 static inline SRTIME rt_timer_tsc2ns(SRTIME tsc)
00082 {
00083         return clockobj_tsc_to_ns(tsc);
00084 }
00085 
00086 SRTIME rt_timer_ns2ticks(SRTIME ns);
00087 
00088 SRTIME rt_timer_ticks2ns(SRTIME ticks);
00089 
00090 RTIME rt_timer_read(void);
00091 
00092 int rt_timer_inquire(RT_TIMER_INFO *info);
00093 
00094 void rt_timer_spin(RTIME ns);
00095 
00096 #ifdef __cplusplus
00097 }
00098 #endif
00099 
00100 #endif /* _ALCHEMY_TIMER_H */
